column4: I've been having problems with Ubuntu literally dying on me when I try to shut it down or logout or reboot with programs open, the Gnome panel locking up completely. And, with Firefox 3 crashing every so often. I kill it, but I can't start it again.

I've been having problems with Ubuntu literally dying on me when I try to shut it down or logout or reboot with programs open, the Gnome panel locking up completely. And, with Firefox 3 crashing every so often. I kill it, but I can't start it again. What should I do?
